reviewText: My first of this line of movies.  It's okay, but kinda cheesy and not what I expected it to be

I have purchased several of these dvds and while I enjoy them, this one is the worst of the worst. The guys are somewhat attractive but so drunk and unintereted that they can't get it up for the camera. All in all, just a big ole let down!! Don't waste your time or money on this one!

just love naked young men , all though not long enough in time, what
they have is fantastic

Guys Gone "What"? Stupid and a big waste of time and money. The female crew gets them naked and so what? These guys are really stupid and the female enticements are so repetitive. They say the same thing to all their victims to encourage them to show it all. Yuk! I know they are probably drunk or high, but I can not believe they don't realize everyone is handed the same line and are probably being laughed at, ridiculed and mocked as soon as they are out of sight.

Guys Gone Wild--The Big Easy was not easy on the eyes. The first couple of scenes the guys are hot however as the show progesses the "hot" factor hits zero and you wish they would be wearing the mask at Mardi Gras and all their clothes. I was hoping for more shots of guys on the street flashsing to the crowd. What should have been the highlight of the movie was a guy shooting his seed, however it turned out having the feel of sleaze and desperation. The best of the series is the original, save your money because these guys are anything but wild, more like EASY prey.

Wow! This video shows everything, and I mean EVERYTHING! The guys aren't just offering glimpses either... these are full-on extended scenes of the hottest young studs doing things to themselves that I would never expect to see outside a XXX movie. Very, very hot.

This is part of the back cover text from the Big Easy DVD:

"Check out 21-year-old Jeremy who strips down and hits the shower to wash his rock hard abs and tight ass. Or Eric, a gorgeous young tan and toned hunk who lies back on his bed and pleasures himself. And just when you think that this has the hottest Guys Gone Wild ever, we introduce you to 22-year-old Tyler who gets wild with a plastic sheep and explodes everywhere!"

The Big Easy title is part of the uncut, uncensored Guys Gone Wild line and is different from the regular Guys Gone Wild titles found in normal stores. This title, along with Dude Where's My Pants?, Frat Boys, and Heat Stroke, are only available from specialty sources are are far more raw and uninhibited.
